item.description:
We live to eat not eat to live right?

Plan is to pick one restaurant from countries starting with alphabets A to Z ( eg. Armenia, Bulgaria.......) around boston every month.....we can make this as a weekend dinner or sunday brunch whatever works...... I can set up times and restaurants if there are enough people interested to try this out....

 

So far I am thinking for A night...we can start with armenian,afghani or albanian food...
item.name: A to Z world cuisine - ("A" Night-Armeninan Food)
